text: Lucius Calpurnius Piso may refer to : *Lucius Calpurnius Piso Caesoninus (consul 148 BC), father of Lucius Calpurnius Piso Caesoninus (consul 112 BC) *Lucius Calpurnius Piso Frugi (consul 133 BC), one of the Annalists *Lucius Calpurnius Piso Caesoninus (consul 112 BC) (before 112 BCafter 107 BC) *Lucius Calpurnius Piso Caesoninus (consul 58 BC) ( BC – 43 BC), father-in-law of Julius Caesar *Lucius Calpurnius Piso Caesoninus (consul 15 BC) (48 BC - AD 32), pontifex *Lucius Calpurnius Piso the Augur, (consul 1 BC) *Lucius Calpurnius Piso (consul 27) *Lucius Calpurnius Piso (consul 57), who married Licinia Magna *Lucius Calpurnius Piso (consul 175) *Lucius Calpurnius Piso Frugi (usurper) (d. 261), Roman usurper whose historicity is in doubt *Lucius Calpurnius Piso Licinianus (d. 69 AD), who was adopted by the emperor Galba as his heir, but murdered fr:Lucius Calpurnius Piso
title: Lucius Calpurnius Piso
